abstract: The activist investor Carl C. Icahn wrote in a regulatory filing on Tuesday that CVR Energy, an independent oil refiner, should sell itself to generate the highest return for its shareholders.
snippet: The activist investor Carl C. Icahn wrote in a regulatory filing on Tuesday that CVR Energy, an independent oil refiner, should sell itself to generate the highest return for its shareholders.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn is trying to play corporate matchmaker once again.

headline.main: Icahn Calls for Sale of CVR Energy

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
